tasks.task_description: Fix CORS headers in admin Lambda function
Fix authentication token handling in admin API calls
Fix catalog page API endpoint routing

description: Fix admin dashboard CORS, authentication, and API routing issues for solution catalog and approval flow
context: Analyzed current setup: CORS headers are already present in admin Lambda function. The issue is not CORS but authentication token handling. Admin routes are properly configured with Cognito authorizer in API Gateway.
Fixed authentication token handling in AdminDashboard and CatalogPage - both now use authService.getToken() consistently instead of the non-existent getIdToken() method.

Verified that CatalogPage already has correct endpoint routing (/catalog for customers, /admin/solutions for admin), solution detail modal is implemented, and admin approval/rejection flow with buttons is already working.
